definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: completion, complete destruction, consumption, annihilation; alw. this form;—
completion, but only as adv., and dubious: completely, altogether Ge 18:21 (J; rd. [[כֻּלָּם]] Ol Kau Buhl), Ex 11:1 (si vera l.)

definitions.body: by men, [[אַל־]] ´[[וְכ]] [[תַּעֲשׂוּ]] Je 5:10; [[בְיׇדוֹ]] ´[[וְכ]] Da 11:16 and (i.e. with) annihilation in his hand.
